batchSetKYCStatus(address[],bool[]).details: Batch set KYC verification status for multiple users

canCreateCampaign(address).details: Check if user can create campaigns (KYC verified and not expired)

createCampaign(string,string,uint256,uin.details: Create a new crowdfunding campaign (bypasses KYC for testing)
Create a new crowdfunding campaign with milestone breakdown (bypasses KYC for testing)

getKYCDetails(address).details: Get KYC verification details for a user

setKYCOracle(address).details: Update KYC oracle address (only current oracle)

setKYCStatus(address,bool).details: Set KYC verification status for a user (only KYC oracle)
